Text: Bulk Mail Accounts Now Affordable kicjhCommercial Email Gets Results Interested in putting your product or service in front of millions To find out how READ ON My name is Paul Willis and I am one of the few who have managed to make a very comfortable living marketing products on the Internet My methods and techniques have been quoted in magazines radio talk shows the Nov th issue of the Wall Street Journal and the Financial Post just to name a few I have marketed everything on the Internet from Personalized Baby Calendars to Information and have made money with everything Even the Wall Street Journal referred to me as being crafty in my techniques that have out maneuvered the anti commerce radicals since How By placing your ad over the Internet and directly into the mailboxes of consumers who like you have an Internet email address Almost every user of the Internet has an email address and we can effectively reach as many of those people as you want FAST and EFFECTIVELY Every year the number of users increases tremendously creating a huge market Why not become part of this unlimited market by placing your personal ad in one of the largest consumer databases We are interested in doing business with you however we DO NOT do pornography chain letters or schemes of any kind Please call us with a legitimate product or service Some of you may not be interested at all and possibly are agitated by our message We will respectfully remove you from our list by request We are responsible commercial emailers and dont want to bother those who are not interested We not only respect you but also our customers We do not want our customers spending their advertising dollars on prospects that do not have any interest Remove instructions are at the end of this letter Below you will find basic mailing options we are offering at this time Check out our October SPECIALS LIMITED TIME OFFER DISCOUNTED MONTHLY COMMERCIAL EMAIL ACCOUNTS We are now offering the following Discounted Monthly Accounts We have recently increased our capabilities by adding two new Servers and are offering the following Discounted Accounts LITE ACCOUNT We send Emails once a month with a maximum of different sales letters and supply you with a pop to receive your replies The Lite account is ideal for someone with a single product line who wants to keep a light but dependable increase to their web site per month INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNT We send Emails with a maximum of different sales letters or products and supply you with a pop account to receive your replies The Intermediate will allow you to market separate products Perfect for a company with more than one product who wishes to increase their Web Site hit count per month PROFESSIONAL ACCOUNT We send Emails with a maximum of different Sales letters or products and supply you with a pop account to receive your replies The Professional will allow you to Market separate products per month Specials are only valid on orders placed thru Call us at or to discuss which option best meets your needs We do mailing for many customers so if you get our voice mail please leave your Name Phone Number the best time to reach you and we will return your call shortly ONETIME MAILING PRICES emails for US emails for US Million emails for US Targeted Mailings We can supply target market addresses by City State Zip Code Business Opportunities Network Marketing Specific IndustriesYou name it All Targeted Mailings must be ordered Two Days prior to Mailing Date Call For Target Quantity Quote If you would like to be removed from
